snippet.title: Bun Snap Trailer
snippet.description:
This game was developed from Nov. 17, 2017–Nov. 19, 2017 for the xkcdGameJam, based off the xkcd comic: Bun.

Play the game here: https://blazingmammothgames.itch.io/bun-snap

Browse the source code here: https://github.com/BlazingMammothGames/xkcdgamejam.

The game is a 3D first-person adventure where you must run around a forest and find buns; taking the best possible pictures of them to score points. Unfortunately, night time is coming soon and you'll have to race against the darkness to get the perfect shot!
